content: CFS-T SLF sleeves Sleeves with flange for fitting plugs to seal round cable/pipe penetrations – for use with CFS-T RR and CFS-T RRS plug seals ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - ### FEATURES:Features Available in corrosion-resistant coated steel (S235 JR) and stainless steel grade 1.4571/A4 (DIN 17456 or AISI 316Ti) Welded to steel bulkheads or decks to facilitate the use of modular plug seals Applications Penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Penetrations in wind power structures Penetrations in concrete For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) ### ITEMS- 2044671 - Cable Transit Sleeve - Package Size 1 pc - 2044660 - Cable Transit Sleeve - Package Size 1 pc - 2044661 - Cable Transit Sleeve - Package Size 1 pc - 2044674 - Cable Transit Sleeve - Package Size 1 pc
